title: Ride (Free Full Movie) Helen Hunt, Luke Wilson

sources.title: Ride (Free Full Movie) Helen Hunt, Luke Wilson
sources.description:
When her son drops out of school, a mother drops everything to follow him to California. With help from an expert surfer, she finds a fresh start of her own in this hilarious and touching film about a mother, her son, and so much more.

Directed by Helen Hunt
2014
Starring Helen Hunt, Brenton Thwaites, Luke Wilson, Robert Knepper, Leonor Varela
Edited for youtube ad friendly standards.
